metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7984 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in Horde before 5.2.8, Horde Groupware before 5.2.11, and Horde Groupware Webmail Edition before 5.2.11 allow remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators for requests that execute arbitrary (1) commands via the cmd parameter to admin/cmdshell.php, (2) SQL queries via the sql parameter to admin/sqlshell.php, or (3) PHP code via the php parameter to admin/phpshell.php.

criterions.comment: php-horde: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
